description.narrative: The project involves an equity investment of up to US$ 35 million in a newly-formed subholding legal entity under Primary Group Limited (the SubHoldCo), a privately-owned investment holding company with significant expertise in the global insurtech sector. The SubHoldCo will hold two subsidiaries of international private medical insurance and five subsidiaries of digital personal lines. Primary Group has a strong track record of 20+ years in investing, growing and exiting early stage, disruptive insurance businesses operating in direct-to-consumer online, retail and wholesale broking, specialist managing general agent, and healthcare insurance. The project will fund the subsidiaries to expand into emerging markets, improve performance and liquidity and further digitalize healthcare insurance.

The project is expected to increase: 1) Accessibility and quality of insurance, namely personal lines (primary auto and home) and international private medical insurance, in growth markets. 2) Competitiveness, as Primary Digital is bringing innovation to product development and distribution that other players in the market are expected to replicate due to competitive pressures. In addition, Primary Health is serving a "niche" segment of the market place that is underserved by national health systems and traditional private insurance. 3) Support to SMEs, as Primary Health's direct distribution as well as new products are expected to provide coverage to SMEs, supporting in their effort to attract and retain talent. 4) Transparency and quality of service by helping end users compare rates and terms across difference insurance providers instantly and seamlessly and therefore make more informed purchase decisions.
